sentences.en: "The shopkeeper gave me 3 sweets for change of 150 kyat when I bought a bottle of cough mixture, " complained a Yangon driver.
sentences.cn: 一位仰光司机抱怨说：“买一瓶咳嗽药，店主应该找我150缅元零钱。 她给了我3颗糖果就算找零了。

sentences.en: At the end of the day, the shopkeeper counted his money.
sentences.cn: 一天过去了, 店主数一数钱.

sentences.en: Barber is just waiting the shopkeeper inside the office.
sentences.cn: 理发师正在办公室里等着老板.

sentences.en: But one of them, a shopkeeper was sad.
sentences.cn: 但他们其中的一个，一位店主有点沮丧。

sentences.en: I was an unknown foreigner, and could have easily evaded payment with impunity, yet no London shopkeeper ever mistrusted me.
sentences.cn: 我是一个没人知道的异乡人，本可以大胆地轻易逃避付款，但是从来没有一个伦敦的店主不信任我。

sentences.en: In Jermyn Street in London, a shopkeeper anxiously asked who the next president would be.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦的杰明街，一个店主焦急地问道，谁将是（美国）下一任总统。

sentences.en: It is natural for the shopkeeper to feel annoyed when the hypermarket is set up close to his shop.
sentences.cn: 当特大超级市场挨着这家商场建立起来时,店主感到苦恼是正常的.

sentences.en: Last month a shopkeeper's nephew was shot dead.
sentences.cn: 上个月一名店主的侄子被枪杀了。

sentences.en: She dickered ( with the shopkeeper ) for the best fruit.
sentences.cn: 她要买店里最好的水果而 ( 跟店主 ) 讨价还价.

sentences.en: That shopkeeper is a scoundrel in the town.
sentences.cn: 那家商店的老板是这个镇上的地头蛇.

sentences.en: The advertised price was 168 dollars, but the shopkeeper knocked off the odd shillings.
sentences.cn: 广告价格是168美元, 但是店主减去了零头.

sentences.en: The girl had only worked for the shopkeeper for three days when she packed him in.
sentences.cn: 这姑娘替那店主只干了三天， 就辞职不干了。

sentences.en: The onus is on the shopkeeper to provide goods which live up to the quality of their description.
sentences.cn: 店主有义务提供质量与其描述相符的商品。

sentences.en: The shopkeeper delivered some goods to me this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨店主给我送来了一些货物.

sentences.en: The shopkeeper gave his store a final checkup before closing for the night.
sentences.cn: 店主在晚上打烊前对商店作了最后检查.

sentences.en: The shopkeeper looked at him in astonishment and then he began laughing.
sentences.cn: 店老板吃惊地瞧他,接着便放声大笑.

sentences.en: The shopkeeper was counting money.
sentences.cn: 店主正在数钱.

sentences.en: The shopkeeper was fined for giving short weight [ measure ] .
sentences.cn: 那店主因卖东西 短斤缺两 而受罚.

sentences.en: The shopkeeper was surprised to find him depart at such speed.
sentences.cn: 店老板见他告辞得如此匆忙,很是惊讶.

sentences.en: They told the shopkeeper to keep the change.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉店主不用找钱了。

trans.tran_en: someone who owns or is in charge of a small shop
